problem.p: Let’s look at a smaller and thinner femur. If the length of the femur (0.47m) and the inner diameter (0.02m) remain the same but the outer diameter is reduced to 0.025m, how much load can the femur support before it fails in compression? Note that the allowable compressive stress of bone is 170x106Pa.
